conversations.english: It was very nice of you both to take me to the airport.
conversations.chinese: 谢谢你们两位把我送到机场。
conversations.reply_english: Oh,it's our pleasure.You'll keep in touch with us at the office,won't you?
conversations.reply_chinese: 哪儿的话。您仍会通过这儿的办事处继续跟我们保持联络，是吧？

title: 假日酒店到机场怎么走

conversations.english: We're now staying at the Holiday Inn. How do we get to the airport?
conversations.chinese: 我们现在住在假日酒店，到机场怎么走？
conversations.reply_english: We have shuttle buses leaving for the airport from downtown every 20 minutes The bus stops at Holiday Inn as well. Be sure to get on the bus before 7: 30.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我们在市区每20分钟有班车开往机场。班车会在假日酒店停。请您7:30之前一定要乘上我们的班车。

title: 请给我一个靠窗的位置

conversations.english: Would you prefer a window or aisle seat?
conversations.chinese: 您比较喜欢靠窗还是靠走道的位置？
conversations.reply_chinese: 请给我一个靠窗的位置。

title: 办理登机手续Checking In at the Airport

conversations.reply_english: Here are our passports and tickets.
conversations.reply_chinese: 这是我们的护照和机票。

conversations.english: Excuse me, but I'm not feeling too well. I think I'm going to throw up.
conversations.chinese: 对不起，我不太舒服。我想我快吐了。
conversations.reply_english: There's an airsickness bag behind the seat that's in front of you.
conversations.reply_chinese: 在你前方的座位后面有一个晕机呕吐袋。

title: 你有需要申报的东西吗
航班延误我可能赶不上换乘的航班了

conversations.english: Ladies and gentlemen,our flight will be delayed for one hour due to the congestion of the airport.
conversations.chinese: 各位女士，各位先生，我们的班机因机场拥挤将会延误一个小时。
conversations.reply_english: Excuse me,Miss.What did the announcement say?
conversations.reply_chinese: 对不起，小姐。广播说些什么呢？

title: 我的手提箱被小偷打开了

conversations.english: Will you tell me the situation?
conversations.chinese: 请你把情形告诉我好吗？
conversations.reply_english: I was in my friend's room talking for an hour or so.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我在朋友房间聊天大概一个小时左右。

title: 我可以看一下你的护照吗 Passport

conversations.chinese: 我可以看一下你的护照吗？

title: 我的行李遗失了 My baggage is missing

conversations.reply_english: Do you have air ticket and claim tag?

title: 机票丢了怎么办 My air ticket is missing

conversations.english: I'm afraid I have lost my air ticket while I was shopping.
conversations.chinese: 我恐怕我是在购物时把机票遗失了。
conversations.reply_english: I'm sorry to hear that.Did you check your shoulder bag carefully?
conversations.reply_chinese: 听到此事我很遗憾，你有没有详细检查你的肩袋呢？

title: 请出示您的登机牌 Boarding pass

conversations.english: Good morning, sir. Can I see your boarding pass, please?
conversations.chinese: 早上好，先生。能给我看一下您的登机牌吗？

conversations.english: What's the matter, sir? You look pale.
conversations.chinese: 怎么啦，先生？你看起来脸色苍白。
conversations.reply_english: I feel dizzy and weak. And I'm having this pain in my ear. I think I am sick.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我感觉头晕，虚弱。耳朵也有点疼，我想我是病了。

title: 在飞机上用餐 Eating on the Plane

conversations.english: Excuse me, sir. What would you like to eat, Chinese food or western food?
conversations.chinese: 打扰一下，先生您要点什么，中餐还是西餐？
conversations.reply_english: I'd like to have Chinese food.
